name: trilateration-sandbox
description: Sandbox environment for stress-testing trilateration algorithms.
author: Michael Boreham <bor3ham@gmail.com>

scripts.publish:demo: git branch -D gh-pages; git push origin --delete gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && yarn && yarn prepare && git add . && git add -f dist && git commit -m "Demo site build" && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master && git push origin gh-pages --force
